remarks: Lemma for ~ pire , ~ pigt2lt4 and ~ sinpi .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2014.)
statement:
pilem.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( 2 (,) 4 ) ) $.
pilem.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.

pilem.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( sin ` B ) = 0 ) $.

pilem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( _pi + A ) / 2 ) <_ B ) $.
